text: 29|12|nirakarippavarkal, nampikkaiyalarkalai nokki â€˜â€˜ninkal enkal valiyaip pinparrunkal. (Atanal etum kurrankuraikal erpattal) unkal kurrankalai nankal cumantu kolkirom'' enru kurukinranar. Eninum, avarkalin (nampikkaiyalarkalin) kurrankaliliruntu etaiyume avarkal (-nirakarippavarkal) cumantukolla mattarkal. Niccayamaka avarkal poyyarkale
